messages.nothingToClear: The tile has no plant, weeds, mulch, grass, or rocks to clear.
messages.noHarvest: The tile is not ready to harvest.
messages.cannotTill: The tile cannot be tilled. It must be bare soil with no plant.
messages.cannotWater: The tile cannot be watered. It must be tilled and not fully moist.
messages.cannotFertilize: The tile cannot be fertilized. It must be tilled and not fully fertile.
messages.cannotPlant: The tile cannot be planted. It must be tilled and empty.
messages.cannotMulch: The tile cannot be mulched. It must be tilled and unmulched.
messages.cannotWeed: There are no weeds to remove on this tile.
